dfm.animation.enable.name: Global animation switch
dfm.animation.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制所有动画效果的总开关（暂未实现）
dfm.animation.enable.description: Used to control all animation effects globally (not implemented yet)

dfm.animation.enter.enable.name: Directory enter animation enabled
dfm.animation.enter.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制进入文件夹时的过渡动画效果
dfm.animation.enter.enable.description: Used to control the transition animation when entering directories

dfm.animation.sort.enable.name: Sort animation enabled
dfm.animation.sort.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制文件排序变化时的过渡动画效果
dfm.animation.sort.enable.description: Used to control the transition animation when changing sort order

dfm.animation.detailview.enable.name: Detail view expand animation enabled
dfm.animation.detailview.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用详情视图展开动效
dfm.animation.detailview.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制详情视图展开和收起时的动画效果
dfm.animation.detailview.enable.description: Used to control the animation when expanding/collapsing detail view

dfm.animation.layout.enable.name: Icon view layout animation enabled
dfm.animation.layout.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用图标视图重新布局动效
dfm.animation.layout.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制图标视图重新布局时的动画效果
dfm.animation.layout.enable.description: Used to control the animation when relayouting icon view

dfm.animation.sidebar.enable.name: Sidebar fold animation enabled
dfm.animation.sidebar.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制侧边栏展开和折叠时的动画效果
dfm.animation.sidebar.enable.description: Used to control the animation when expanding/collapsing sidebar

dfm.animation.enter.duration.name: Change dir animation duration
dfm.animation.enter.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切换目录时动效播放时长
dfm.animation.enter.duration.description: Used to adjust the change dir animation duration

dfm.animation.enter.curve.name: Change dir animation curve
dfm.animation.enter.curve.name[zh_CN]: 切换目录动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.enter.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切换目录时动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.enter.curve.description: Used to adjust the change dir animation curve

dfm.animation.enter.scale.name: Change dir animation scale
dfm.animation.enter.scale.name[zh_CN]: 切换目录动效缩放幅度
dfm.animation.enter.scale.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切换目录时动效缩放幅度
dfm.animation.enter.scale.description: Used to adjust the change dir animation scale

dfm.animation.enter.opacity.name: Change dir animation opacity
dfm.animation.enter.opacity.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切换目录时动效中视图最低透明度
dfm.animation.enter.opacity.description: Used to adjust the change dir animation opacity

dfm.animation.layout.duration.name: View layout animation duration
dfm.animation.layout.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整视图重布局时动效播放时长
dfm.animation.layout.duration.description: Used to adjust the view layout animation duration

dfm.animation.layout.curve.name: View layout animation curve
dfm.animation.layout.curve.name[zh_CN]: 视图重布局动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.layout.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切视图重布局时动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.layout.curve.description: Used to adjust the view layout animation curve

dfm.animation.detailview.duration.name: Detail view show animation duration
dfm.animation.detailview.duration.name[zh_CN]: 详细视图出入动效时长
dfm.animation.detailview.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整详细视图开关时动效播放时长
dfm.animation.detailview.duration.description: Used to adjust the detail view show animation duration

dfm.animation.detailview.curve.name: Detail view show animation curve
dfm.animation.detailview.curve.name[zh_CN]: 详细视图出入动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.detailview.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整详细视图出入时动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.detailview.curve.description: Used to adjust the detail view show animation curve

dfm.animation.sidebar.duration.name: Sidebar show animation duration
dfm.animation.sidebar.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整侧边栏开关时动效播放时长
dfm.animation.sidebar.duration.description: Used to adjust the sidebar show animation duration

dfm.animation.sidebar.curve.name: Sidebar show animation curve
dfm.animation.sidebar.curve.name[zh_CN]: 侧边栏出入动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.sidebar.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整侧边栏出入时动效动画曲线
dfm.animation.sidebar.curve.description: Used to adjust the sidebar show animation curve

dd.animation.resort.custom.duration.name: Desktop canvas resort animation duration(custom mode)
dd.animation.resort.custom.duration.name[zh_CN]: 桌面自定义排列重排序动效时长
dd.animation.resort.custom.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整桌面自定义排列重排序时动效播放时长
dd.animation.resort.custom.duration.description: Used to adjust the desktop canvas resort animation duration(custom mode)

dd.animation.resort.custom.curve.name: Desktop canvas resort animation curve(custom mode)
dd.animation.resort.custom.curve.name[zh_CN]: 桌面自定义排列重排序动效动画曲线
dd.animation.resort.custom.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切桌面自定义排列重排序时动效动画曲线
dd.animation.resort.custom.curve.description: Used to adjust the desktop canvas resort animation curve(custom mode)

dd.animation.resort.align.duration.name: Desktop canvas resort animation duration(align mode)
dd.animation.resort.align.duration.name[zh_CN]: 桌面自动排列重排序动效时长
dd.animation.resort.align.duration.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整桌面自动排列重排序时动效播放时长
dd.animation.resort.align.duration.description: Used to adjust the desktop canvas resort animation duration(align mode)

dd.animation.resort.align.curve.name: Desktop canvas resort animation curve(align mode)
dd.animation.resort.align.curve.name[zh_CN]: 桌面自动排列重排序动效动画曲线
dd.animation.resort.align.curve.description[zh_CN]: 用于调整切桌面自动排列重排序时动效动画曲线
